Articles.Content:
Even though sound does travel through empty space, having sound is nice on external view.

I've seen some videos with very impressive rocket sounds (especially at takeoff), or even decoupling sounds, docking... Is there somekind of mod that improove that ?

(I already use Chaterer which add some immesion)

Thx.

Hot rockets is about particles (flames and smoke)

Ship Effects is about sound design.

Am I right ?
I turned off hotrockets due to a few bugs that kept cropping up and because I couldn't stand the Poodle's effects. It's great if you like the effects though!

> 
> Hot rockets is about particles (flames and smoke)

I kind of remembered Hotrockets changing the sound too, but seems I was wrong. (What was it then??)

ShipEffects adds docking sounds and some others, yes.
I've found it. It was simply KW rocketry rocket sounds. Those sounds age amazing. Sadly It's not possible to switch vanilla engine sounds...

> 
> I've found it. It was simply KW rocketry rocket sounds. Those sounds age amazing. Sadly It's not possible to switch vanilla engine sounds...

Well not necessarily...

ah, is it possible ? KW rocket sound are fantastic.Is it possible to get them work on stock engines ?

Is there a mod to do that ?

> 
> ah, is it possible ? KW rocket sound are fantastic.Is it possible to get them work on stock engines ??

I've actually been working on just that in my spare time.
